traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Niv-Mizzet fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Locus of the Firemind
entries: Niv-Mizzet can maintain {@status concentration} on two different spells at the same time. In addition, he has advantage on saving throws to maintain {@status concentration} on spells.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: Niv-Mizzet has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Master Chemister
entries: When Niv-Mizzet casts a spell that deals damage, he can change the spell's damage to cold, fire, force, lightning, or thunder.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Niv-Mizzet makes three attacks: one with his bite and two with his claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +17 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. 18 (2d8 + 9 damage) piercing damage plus 14 (4d6 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +17 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d4 + 9 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. 16 (2d6 + 9 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Niv-Mizzet exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw, taking 91 (26d6 damage) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: Niv-Mizzet casts one of his cantrips.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Niv-Mizzet beats his wings. Each creature within 15 feet of him must succeed on a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 2d4 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. Niv-Mizzet can then fly up to half his flying speed.

legendary.name: Dracogenius (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Niv-Mizzet regains a spell slot of 3rd level or lower.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Niv-Mizzet is a 20th-level Izzet spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 26}, {@hit 18} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:
